Detailed Description

Class for testing that CEL files are the same +/- some epsilon. Also checks to make sure that at least some of the headers are the same (times/dates/versions change so not checked).

bool CelCheck::check ( std::string &  msg  )  [inline, virtual]

Check to make sure that two files are the same +/- some epsilon.

Parameters:
msg - Fills in an error message if test fails, empty string otherwise.
Returns:
- Returns true if files are close enough, false otherwise.
